analysis.summary:
ISSUES
Critical:
- The "How It Works" page failed the test, indicating potential issues that need immediate attention. It is recommended to investigate the cause of the failure and optimize the page to improve its performance.
insights: The pricing page has the fastest load time (289.5ms) and TTFB (147.1ms), indicating that it is the most optimized page. Analyzing the elements on this page and applying the same optimization techniques to other pages can help improve their performance.

The blog page has a longer FCP (353ms) compared to its load time (420.29ms), indicating that there may be some elements that are causing a delay in painting the first content on the page. Investigating these elements and optimizing them can help improve the user experience.

Reducing the load time of the homepage can help improve the user experience, as it is the first page that users see when they visit the website. Optimizing the elements on the homepage can help reduce the load time and provide a faster and more seamless user experience.
